welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Luis Obispo! Known for its charming atmosphere and beautiful surroundings, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Luis County Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal at San Luis County Regional Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Public Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Public Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paso Robles Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Paso Robles Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
